mapper.select: select product_id as id, product_name as name, product_price as price, product_discount as discount, product_create_date as createDate from product order by product_create_date desc limit 4

select comm_id as id, comm_title as title, comm_content as content, comm_view_count as viewCount, comm_status as status, comm_like_count as likeCount, comm_scrap_count as scrapCount, comm_complaint_count as complaintCount, comm_image_name as imageName from community where comm_category_id = #{value} and comm_status = 'active' order by comm_view_count desc limit 4
